participant_1.background:
I live in a rural area, where I can enjoy horseback riding and keep my mind off my loss.
i am an angry person.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
i work on a farm.

participant_2.background:
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
i work for a clothes retailer.
i have a family of three daughters.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
I am a software engineer who works remotely, so I can live in a big city and still take care of my parents in my hometown.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you. I am a farmer and I live in a rural area. I do enjoy horseback riding.
That sounds like a very peaceful and relaxing lifestyle. I live in a big city and work for a clothes retailer. I enjoy reading fairytales on the weekends.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I am not very close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.
I have a family of three daughters and I love spending time with them. My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
That sounds like a very busy and exciting life. I am an angry person, but I try to keep my mind off my loss by spending time in nature.
I am sorry to hear about your loss. I hope you are able to find peace and happiness.
Thank you. I am trying to. I am glad that I was able to meet you today.
I am glad I met you too. I hope we can talk again soon.
